# Battlefield Fortification (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Area:** See text

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Heroes of Battle (WotC), pg. 125

You shift earth to create a shallow trench or a berm (*Heroes of Battle* 35). The trench or berm created is a straight line up to 5 feet long per two caster levels. A berm created by this spell is 2 squares wide.

This spell has no effect when cast in an area of stone such as an unworked cavern floor, a flagstone floor, or a cobblestone street.
